name: v1_mortgagecalculator
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool mortgage_calculator_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Simple-yet-powerful mortgage calculator for home financing. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/mortgagecalculator.
API description: API Ninjas Mortgage Calculator API endpoint. Either **loan_amount** or (**home_value** + **downpayment**) parameters must be set.

interest_rate.description: Annual interest rate (in %). For example, a 3.5% interest rate would be 3.5. Cannot exceed 10000.

downpayment.description: Downpayment on the home or asset. Cannot exceed home_value.

home_value.description: Total value of the home or asset. Must be greater than downpayment.

duration_years.description: Duration of the loan in years. Must be between 1 and 10000. If not set, default value is 30 years.
